author: Mark Murray
title: Poll: Six-in-10 support keeping stay-at-home restrictions to fight coronavirus
description: Fifty-eight percent say they are more worried about stopping the virus' spread while 32 percent are more concerned with the economic fallout, new NBC News/WSJ poll shows.
content: WASHINGTON Nearly 60 percent of American voters say they are more concerned that a relaxation of stay-at-home restrictions would lead to more COVID-19 deaths than they are that those restrictions will hurt the U.S. economy, according to a new national NBC New… [+7425 chars]
